channel.title: Packet sizes
channel.description:
Hello, moparscape I am adding a custom packet and trying to send an Integer to the client, but I am having trouble trying to figure out the correct packet size.
Can someone please post a list of what variable is what size?
example:
short = 2 (Idk if thats real size)
